dslc_content_for_search:
  - "Your Consultation is Scheduled, You're Almost Done...Thank you so much for scheduling a consultation with us. We're really looking forward to speaking with you and answering any questions you might have. Please take a couple minutes to watch this video and then PLEASE complete your consultation questionnaire below... it takes about 5 to 10 minutes. There's three really good reasons for completing your Pre-Consultation Questionnaire below... You'll likely uncover new insights and opportunities about your business simply by taking the time to answer these questions.We will both be able to get that much more done on our call together if we don't have to run through all of these questions during our time on the phone.It demonstrates a level of commitment and serious intent about the investment that you're willing to make in your business.You can also download a PDF version of this questionnaire here and email or fax it to us. "

    <h1 style="text-align: center;">Your&nbsp;Consultation is Scheduled, You're Almost Done...</h1><p>Thank you so much for scheduling a consultation with us. We're really looking forward to speaking with you and answering any questions you might have. Please take&nbsp;a couple minutes to watch this video and then PLEASE complete your consultation questionnaire below...&nbsp;it takes about 5 to 10 minutes.&nbsp;</p> <script charset="ISO-8859-1" src="//fast.wistia.com/assets/external/E-v1.js" async></script>

    Pre-Consultation Questionnaire below...</h3> <ol><li>You'll likely uncover new insights and opportunities about your business simply by taking the time to answer these questions.</li><li>We will both be able to get that much more done on our call together if we don't have to run through all of these questions during our time on the phone.</li><li>It demonstrates a level of commitment and serious intent&nbsp;about the investment that you're willing to make in your business.</li></ol><h3><strong>You can also download a <a href="http://d3dysdui7y3buv.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/28162115/Consultation-Questionnaire-Form.pdf" target="_blank">PDF version of this questionnaire here</a> and email or fax it to us.</strong>&nbsp;</h3>
